§ 40115. Aviation weather research The Administrator may carry out a program of collaborative research with the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration on convective weather events, with the goal of significantly improving the reliability of 2-hour to 6-hour aviation weather forecasts. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3381.)
